meanings.sent1: The planners at the meeting organized the event efficiently.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a talented planner and always helps us make fun plans.
meanings.sent3: The planners decided to have a picnic in the park, but it started raining!
meanings.sent4: She was the master planner of the surprise party, making sure everything was perfect.
meanings.sent5: The wedding planner made the venue look like a fairytale dream.

meanings.definition: A device or system for planning.
meanings.sent1: The digital planners on our phones help us keep track of important dates.
meanings.sent2: The city used advanced planners to design the new public transportation system.
meanings.sent3: The old-fashioned planners were no match for the new high-tech ones.
meanings.sent4: The project planner laid out the timeline for the construction project.
meanings.sent5: The meal planner app suggested healthy recipes for the week.

meanings.definition: A book or similar item used for planning.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my planners with me to jot down ideas and to-do lists.
meanings.sent2: The student's planner had colorful tabs for each subject to stay organized.
meanings.sent3: The planner was filled with doodles and stickers, making it unique.
meanings.sent4: She opened her planner to reveal a detailed schedule for the week.
meanings.sent5: The travel planner included maps and recommendations for sightseeing.
